keyMoments.title: Crash Landing in Tower of Justice
keyMoments.description: The entire crew arrives at the Tower of Justice via the Rocketman sea train, crashing through the front wall in a dramatic entrance.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the crew's arrival at the heart of Enies Lobby to rescue Robin from the World Government.

keyMoments.title: Strategic Division for CP9 Battles
keyMoments.description: Following Sanji's strategy, the crew splits up to engage CP9 members individually while Luffy pursues Robin and Spandam.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's tactical coordination and trust in each other's abilities to handle dangerous opponents.

keyMoments.title: Five Keys Challenge Revealed
keyMoments.description: Fukurou reveals CP9's strategy: one real key to Robin's seastone handcuffs distributed among five members, with four decoys, forcing the Straw Hats to battle all of them.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the tactical framework for the Tower of Justice battles, showcasing CP9's strategic thinking.

keyMoments.title: Ordered to Massacre the Invaders
keyMoments.description: Spandam orders CP9 to eliminate all invaders while he escapes with Robin and Rob Lucci toward the Gates of Justice.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the ruthlessness of CP9 and the World Government's willingness to kill to protect their interests.
